sources.title: CONQUEST OF SPACE
sources.description: This is another George Pal flick. He had many to his credit. Unfortunately this one was a flop at the boxoffice and pretty much stiffled his continuing to have carte blanche to do the films as he chose. I liked it. Then again I'm partial to B scifi.

metadata.Plot: An American-led team of International astronauts leave their space station on the first mission to Mars, but the captain's religious beliefs may get in the way.
metadata.Writer: Chesley Bonestell, Willy Ley, Philip Yordan
metadata.Actors: Walter Brooke, Eric Fleming, Mickey Shaughnessy
